special_text:
[i](At the beginning of your upkeep, if you weren’t dealt combat damage since your last turn, put a brick counter on this Outpost.)[/i]
At the beginning of your upkeep, draw a card and lose 1 life.
 2+ Bricks
{B}, {T}, Discard a card: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. 
 4+ Bricks
{B}{B}, {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool for each swamp you control.
